declarations.description: A custom HTML element for displaying highlighted, editable code blocks.
declarations.name: code

members.name: copy
members.description: Copies the code to the clipboard.

members.name: language
members.description: Gets the language of the code block.

members.name: hightlightValue
members.description: Sets the highlighted value of the code block.

members.name: sourceValue
members.description: Sets the source value of the code block.

members.name: value
members.description: Gets the value of the code block.

attributes.name: trim
attributes.description: Trims empty first and last lines, and most importantly, indentation.

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: Defines the code language (auto-detect if not set).

attributes.name: element
attributes.description: ID of the element whose innerHTML should be used as code.
